Sql.query:
INSERT INTO TRN_TRANS_ENTREGA_DETALLE (TENTCODI,TENTDECODI,TENTDEVERSION, TENTDEDIA,TENTDEPROMEDIODIA,TENTDESUMADIA, TENTDE1,TENTDE2,TENTDE3,TENTDE4,TENTDE5, TENTDE6,TENTDE7,TENTDE8,TENTDE9,TENTDE10,
TENTDE11,TENTDE12,TENTDE13,TENTDE14,TENTDE15, TENTDE16,TENTDE17,TENTDE18,TENTDE19,TENTDE20,
TENTDE21,TENTDE22,TENTDE23,TENTDE24,TENTDE25, TENTDE26,TENTDE27,TENTDE28,TENTDE29,TENTDE30,
TENTDE31,TENTDE32,TENTDE33,TENTDE34,TENTDE35, TENTDE36,TENTDE37,TENTDE38,TENTDE39,TENTDE40,
TENTDE41,TENTDE42,TENTDE43,TENTDE44,TENTDE45, TENTDE46,TENTDE47,TENTDE48,TENTDE49,TENTDE50,
TENTDE51,TENTDE52,TENTDE53,TENTDE54,TENTDE55, TENTDE56,TENTDE57,TENTDE58,TENTDE59,TENTDE60,
TENTDE61,TENTDE62,TENTDE63,TENTDE64,TENTDE65, TENTDE66,TENTDE67,TENTDE68,TENTDE69,TENTDE70,
TENTDE71,TENTDE72,TENTDE73,TENTDE74,TENTDE75, TENTDE76,TENTDE77,TENTDE78,TENTDE79,TENTDE80,
TENTDE81,TENTDE82,TENTDE83,TENTDE84,TENTDE85, TENTDE86,TENTDE87,TENTDE88,TENTDE89,TENTDE90,
TENTDE91,TENTDE92,TENTDE93,TENTDE94,TENTDE95, TENTDE96,TENTDEUSERNAME,TENTDEFECINS
)VALUES ( :TENTCODI,:TENTDECODI,:TENTDEVERSION,:TENTDEDIA,:TENTDEPROMEDIODIA,:TENTDESUMADIA, :TENTDE1,:TENTDE2,:TENTDE3,:TENTDE4,:TENTDE5, :TENTDE6,:TENTDE7,:TENTDE8,:TENTDE9,:TENTDE10,
:TENTDE11,:TENTDE12,:TENTDE13,:TENTDE14,:TENTDE15, :TENTDE16,:TENTDE17,:TENTDE18,:TENTDE19,:TENTDE20,
:TENTDE21,:TENTDE22,:TENTDE23,:TENTDE24,:TENTDE25, :TENTDE26,:TENTDE27,:TENTDE28,:TENTDE29,:TENTDE30,
:TENTDE31,:TENTDE32,:TENTDE33,:TENTDE34,:TENTDE35, :TENTDE36,:TENTDE37,:TENTDE38,:TENTDE39,:TENTDE40,
:TENTDE41,:TENTDE42,:TENTDE43,:TENTDE44,:TENTDE45, :TENTDE46,:TENTDE47,:TENTDE48,:TENTDE49,:TENTDE50,
:TENTDE51,:TENTDE52,:TENTDE53,:TENTDE54,:TENTDE55, :TENTDE56,:TENTDE57,:TENTDE58,:TENTDE59,:TENTDE60,
:TENTDE61,:TENTDE62,:TENTDE63,:TENTDE64,:TENTDE65, :TENTDE66,:TENTDE67,:TENTDE68,:TENTDE69,:TENTDE70,
:TENTDE71,:TENTDE72,:TENTDE73,:TENTDE74,:TENTDE75, :TENTDE76,:TENTDE77,:TENTDE78,:TENTDE79,:TENTDE80,
:TENTDE81,:TENTDE82,:TENTDE83,:TENTDE84,:TENTDE85, :TENTDE86,:TENTDE87,:TENTDE88,:TENTDE89,:TENTDE90,
:TENTDE91,:TENTDE92,:TENTDE93,:TENTDE94,:TENTDE95, :TENTDE96,:TENTDEUSERNAME,:TENTDEFECINS )
delete from trn_trans_entrega_detalle where tentcodi in (select tentcodi from TRN_TRANS_ENTREGA where emprcodi = :emprcodi and pericodi = :pericodi and tentversion = :tentversion )
select TENTCODIGO from trn_trans_entrega where (EMPRCODI = :EMPRCODI ) and (PERICODI= :PERICODI OR :PERICODI IS NULL) order by tentcodigo asc

select * from trn_trans_entrega_detalle a join trn_trans_entrega b on a.tentcodi=b.tentcodi where (B.EMPRCODI = :EMPRCODI ) and (B.PERICODI= :PERICODI OR :PERICODI IS NULL)and (B.TENTCODIGO = :TENTCODIGO OR :TENTCODIGO IS NULL)and (B.TENTVERSION = :TENTVERSION OR :TENTVERSION IS NULL) order by a.tentdedia asc
select emprcodi,barrcodi,tentcodigo,equicodi,pericodi,tentversion,tenttipoinformacion from TRN_TRANS_ENTREGA where pericodi = :pericodi and tentversion = :tentversion

select pericodi, barrcodi, nombBarra, tentcodigo, Energia from( select te.pericodi, te.barrcodi, (select barrnombre from trn_barra b where b.barrcodi=te.barrcodi) as nombBarra, te.tentcodigo, sum(d.tentdesumadia) as Energia from trn_trans_entrega te join trn_trans_entrega_detalle d on te.tentcodi=d.tentcodi where (te.pericodi=:pericodi or :pericodi is null) group by te.pericodi, te.barrcodi, te.tentcodigo union select r.pericodi, r.barrcodi, (select barrnombre from trn_barra b where b.barrcodi=r.barrcodi) as nombBarra, r.tretcodigo, sum(rd.tretdesumadia) as Energia from trn_trans_retiro r join trn_trans_retiro_detalle rd on r.tretcodi=rd.tretcodi where (r.pericodi=:pericodi or :pericodi is null) group by r.pericodi, r.barrcodi, r.tretcodigo )t group by pericodi, barrcodi, nombBarra, tentcodigo, Energia
